event.title: was wrecked at the mouth of the Siuslaw River on February 17, 1875

data.event: Some claim that the city was named after state senator A. B. Florence, who represented Lane County from 1858 to 1860; another claim is that Florence was named after a French vessel that was wrecked at the mouth of the Siuslaw River on February 17, 1875.

event.title: annexed Driftwood Shores hotel and conference center north of town in Heceta Beach in 2008

data.event: Florence annexed Driftwood Shores hotel and conference center north of town in Heceta Beach in 2008.
